content:
I'm getting errors in my examples where the Identifier systems are not resolving:

URL value 'http://hl7.org/fhir/ca-bc/client/bc-org' does not resolve
URL value 'http://hl7.org/fhir/ca-bc/client/bc-ssri' does not resolve

From the specification: quote If the system is a URL, it SHOULD resolve.

I don't think this should be an error, but a warning if anything. Eventually these URLs might resolve but they don't while we are building the IG.
it's because they're in hl7.org/fhir, and they will never be valid
Jean Duteau has marked this topic as resolved.
